feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: An Introduction
entry.content: Welcome to the blog! Over time, I hope to collect useful code, and commentaries on science, technology and anything else that catches my interest. For now, Iâ€™m just getting started, so take a look around the rest of the site, and I hope to have something to share soon!
